tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE legal_document_versions ( 
  document_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  document_name VARCHAR(255), 
  revision_number INT, 
  revision_date TIMESTAMP, 
  reviewer_name VARCHAR(255), 
  is_compliant BOOLEAN 
)

CREATE TABLE DocumentRevisions (
    revision_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_id INT REFERENCES LegalDocuments(document_id),
    revised_by TEXT NOT NULL,
    revisions_notes TEXT,
    revision_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE legal_documents (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  document_name VARCHAR(255),
  version INT,
  revision_date DATE,
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE document_versions (
  version_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  document_id UUID REFERENCES legal_documents(id),
  file_url VARCHAR(255),
  version_number INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE document_revisions (
  revision_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  version_id UUID REFERENCES document_versions(version_id),
  revision_number INT,
  revised_by VARCHAR(255),
  revised_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE revision_history (
  history_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  revision_id UUID REFERENCES document_revisions(revision_id),
  revision_notes TEXT,
  approved_by VARCHAR(255),
  approved_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE legal_documents (
    document_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    document_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    document_content TEXT NOT NULL,
    version_number INT NOT NULL,
    revision_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE document_versions (
    version_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    document_id UUID NOT NULL,
    version_number INT NOT NULL,
    version_date DATE NOT NULL,
    editor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE document_revisions (
    revision_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    version_id UUID NOT NULL,
    revised_content TEXT NOT NULL,
    revised_by VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    revision_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE revision_log (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    revision_id UUID NOT NULL,
    action_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    action_detail TEXT,
    action_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
